info.description:
# **Overview** *This page describes a request made by eBET to a channel to verify user login or notify money changes.* There are two ways to manage player money: single wallet and transfer wallet. "transfer wallet" : The player's money is managed by eBET. "single wallet" : The player's money is managed by the channel. API sends different requests depending on the management method. **All APIs of a single wallet must be implemented** # **About the login process** 1. Provide eBET player information with different login methods. eventType = 1: Enter account and password on eBET h5 webpage or App eventType = 3: The user clicks the **applink link** after logging in on the channel platform eventType = 4: The user clicks the **token link** after logging in on the channel platform 2. eBET sends a verification login API request to the channel. transfer wallet: RegisterOrLoginReq single wallet: registerOrLogin 3. eBET determines whether to enter the game based on the response of the channel. # **Send game related types** *Bet: eBET sends a bet request when the user clicks once to confirm the bet. There is no limit to the number of clicks in a round.* *Payout: After stopping betting, count betting records for that round and send a payout request.* **Basic** Bet: Request a bet (type = 1). If the return fails, the bet fails. Payout: Request a payout (type = 2). If the return fails, request the same content again after checking. **Special** - *This process is used when there is a doubling bet on bullbull.* Bet: Request a withholding (type = 27) first, and then request a bet (type = 1) if the withholding response is successful. Failure to withhold will be treated as a basic bet failure. When the bet fails, will send a bet error refund (type = 11) request to the channel for refund of withholding money. A bet error refund request will be sent by eBET. Payout: If there is a remaining withholding amount, first request a withholding return (type = 28), and then request a payout (type = 2). if the withholding return is successful; if there is no remaining withholding amount, directly request a payout (type = 2) # **Bet failure process** ***Definition of bet failure: eBET received a status other than 200 or did not receive a response.*** In the request for payout, betmoney = 0 means that eBET believes that the bet was unsuccessful, so the relevant payout amount is not calculated. What the channel can do at this time is as follows: 1. Channel own refund *payout:* The channel checks the betList and refunds itself if there is a record of failed bets. *query:* When eBET sends a query request, the bet slip status returns 209 to indicate that the bet has been refunded. 2. eBET request refund - Channel's DB allows modification again *payout:* Normal response without checking betList. *query:* Provide the record of the channel DB. If the return is incorrect, it may not be refunded. *refund:* Request a refund based on the implemented refund API. 3. eBET request refund - Channel's DB **doesn't allow** modification *payout:* Check betList. Respond to payout failure to eBET if a bet fails. *query:* Provide the record of the channel DB. If the return is incorrect, it may not be refunded. *refund:* Request a refund based on the implemented refund API. After the refund is completed, the payout request will be resent. # **Single wallet special use** 1. syncCredit will send a request after registerOrLogin responds successfully. **Both must be successful** before users can log in to eBET games. 2. syncCredit response **status: 410** will cause players to leave the eBET game. 3. The channel can customize the username of other API requests when registerOrLogin response. (eBET backend needs to enable related settings) # **Suggested response status code**
Status Code Description
 200  Successful
 202  Channel no exist
 206  seqNo no exist
 207  Refund Money Inconsistent
 208  Record is not existed
 209  Check record already refund
 401  User or password error
 410  Token error
 500  Server error
 505  Channel under maintenance
 1003  Not enough balance
 4003  System busy, try back later
 4025  Parameter error
 4026  Signature error
 4027  IP is not authorized
 4029  Function disable
 4030  Data type error
 4037  User not existence
 4038  Frequent request
 5003  Sub channel no exist
info.title: eBET request

tags.name: API used by transfer wallet
tags.description: eBET provides several APIs for transfer wallet.

tags.name: API used by single wallet
tags.description: eBET provides an API for single wallet.

tags.name: Common API
tags.description: APIs that any wallet can use.

post.description: This api is used to verify user login. It will send the request directly to the server url provided by the channel. Demo link：Demo request & response

nickname.example: User nickname, randomly generated by default

post.description: This api is used to confirm user information. It will send the request after the RegisterOrLoginReq response is successful. Its failure to implement does not affect player login Demo link：Demo request & response
This api is used to verify user login. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/registerOrLogin Demo link：Demo request & response

nickname.example: User nickname, randomly generated by default

post.description: This api is to confirm the user's current amount of money. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/syncCredit Demo link：Demo request & response

money.description: User current money. The recommended amount is only to the second decimal place

post.summary: Notification of change of user money amount
post.description: This API is a notification channel for changing player money. Note 1: seqNo is **unique value**. Avoid repeated processing of money, do not record the same payout seqNo. Note 2: We have a **retry** mechanism. If it has been processed successfully before, please return 201 (seqNo repeated). Note 3: If the network occurs or your system returns a system error and the system is busy, we will try to resend **3 times**. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/increaseCredit Demo link：Demo request & response

This API is for querying the processing status of increaseCredit in the channel's database. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/queryIncreaseCreditRecord Demo link：Demo request & response

creditRecord.description: Channel records. Returns empty array means no records

creditTime.description: Recording time. Used to milliseconds. Format is Unix Time.

post.description: This API is eBET's manual refund request for failed bets. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/refundSingleWallet Demo link：Demo request & response

status.description:
Recorded processing status code
 200: The channel has received the eBET request and processed it
 209: Channel has refunded itself

post.description: Regularly check the records of failed bets and send them to the channel to process refunds in batches. The request address it sends is the server url + api of the channel. E.g. http://127.0.0.1/autoBatchRefund Note 1.Parameter detail may contain plural betId/betType/money Note 2.Parameter detail > money total is refundMoney Note 3.Only refund bet fail but payout success record Demo link：Demo request & response

refundTotalMoney.description: Total amount of refund processed successfully

sucRefundSeqNoList.description:
Details of successful bet refund processing.
 If all processing fails, please return empty array

post.summary: The purpose of this API is to monitor whether the server connection of the partner is normal
post.description:
This API is only used to detect the server status of the channel receiving the API. 
 The request will be sent directly to the server URL provided by the channel. 
 Note: When the network status is unstable, eBET staff will manually request confirmation.

username.description: Username. Cannot use http reserved characters.

subChannelId.description: Sub-channel ID. Enter 0 if not created.

seqNo.description: eBET sequence number. Please return the same value.

sessionToken.description: Provided by channels or randomly generated.

password.description: User password. Empty string if no

accessToken.description: This parameter value is provided by the channel. Only used when eventType = 4

timestamp.description: Current time. Used to seconds. Format is Unix Time

signature.description:
Signature. String splicing:
 normal/applink: username+timestamp
 token: timestamp+accessToken

timestamp.description: Current time. Used to seconds. Format is Unix Time

password.description: User password. Empty string if no

accessToken.description: This parameter value is provided by the channel. Only used when eventType = 4

betMoney.description: Bet amount. When betMoney = 0, the bet failed.

seqNo.description: The sequence number of the bet request. This parameter is only available for payouts.

payout.description: Payout amount. This parameter is only available when payout.

number.description: Bet number. This parameter is only available for specific items.

odds.description:
Odds. 
 Noted: 
 1.Supports all games except slot machines. 
 2.Only when payout (type:2). 
 3.Odds do not include bet.

validBet.description:
Valid bets for each bet item. 
 This parameter will be based on the calculation rules of valid bets, please refer to the page: Parameter description - Valid betting instructions. 
 Only for payout (type:2) request.

betTime.description: Bet time. Used to milliseconds. Format is Unix Time

withholdingSeqNo.description: BullBull Withholding refund request seqNo, only type=11 have this parameter

srcResults.description: The flop result. Baccarat: A group of 3 cards, The order is the Player first and then the Banker. If the third card does not need to be handed out, will be replaced by null. Dragon Tiger: A group of 2 cards, The order is the Dragon first and then the Tiger. Bull Bull: A group of 5 cards, The order is the Banker first and then the Player1, Player2, Player3. Pok Deng: A group of 2 cards, The order is the Banker first and then the Player1, Player2, Player3, Player4, Player5. Please refer to the bet code

brokerageRequired.description: Whether it is commission baccarat. Only Baccarat payout has this parameter.

payoutTime.description: Payout time. Used to milliseconds. Format is Unix Time

eventBonusType.description: Event bonus type.(Only type = 38 has this parameter.)

eventBonusCode.description: Event bouns name.(Only type = 38 has this parameter.)

betStopTime.description: Bet stop time. Used to milliseconds. Format is Unix Time. This parameter is only available for payouts.

matchId.description: Match code. Format is Unix Time. Only type = 8 or 9 has this parameter.

withHoldingList.description: The withholding return list will replace betList in the withholding return request. Please refer to withHoldingList

withHolding.description: Withholding amount. When betMoney=0, it means betting has failed.

status.description:
Withholding status
 1: success
 0: failure or no amount to be returned
 11: refund
 13: Refund failed

seqNo.description: The sequence number of the withholding request.

refund.description: Refund with BullBull game,only type=28 have this parameter。

money.description: The amount of change. If negative, the amount to be deducted Channel ID.

querySeqNo.description: The serial number to be queried, separated by commas.

refundMoney.description: Refund amount. The value is negative.
Refund amount. This value is positive.

lastStartProcessTime.description: Batch processing time. Used to milliseconds. Format is Unix Time.

seqNo.description: eBET sequence number. Please return the same value.
